# Introduction

This report provides analysis on the correlation between different variables from the data found in **Music Dataset: Lyrics and Metadata from 1950 to 2019.** [@fontelles2020; @fontelles2020a]. Computations were enacted on the 10,000 song snippet dataset due to hardware limitations.
